data.message: Someone is telling me I won some kind of lottery or promotion.s thusthis a real thing and what is going on? Am I getting scammed

replies.message: Hey Shane, this sounds like a hoax. We recommend that you do not provide any personal or financial information to the sender and report the spam to us by following these tips: http://on.fb.me/1n0Wt42. Thanks for helping us keep Facebook a safe place! -Nancy

Her name is Beth Dvorak Angela . She says she works for you in the Facebook Security Operations Inc. 
I know better than to believe that but I was wandering if you could do something about it. Besides have me report it as spam.
